name: Kryptonite Evolution Mini-5 Bike U-Lock, Heavy Duty Anti-Theft Bicycle U Lock, 13mm Steel Shackle Mounting Bracket and Keys, High Security Lock for Bicycles Scooters,Black
short_description: HIGH-SECURITY DESIGN: Made from a 13mm hardened max-performance steel shackle, this bike lock provides maximum resistance against cutting and leverage attacks

PATENTED LOCKING SYSTEM: Features a patented hardened double deadbolt design that gives additional protection against twist attacks, with a high-security disc-style cylinder, resistant to picking and drilling
MULTI-FUNCTIONAL: This Kryptonite bike lock is ideal to secure your bicycles, sports equipment, gates and fences, tool boxes & ladders, grills & lawnmowers, skateboards, truck bed and more
SPECIFICATIONS: U-Lock Interior Dimensions 3.25" x 5.5", 13mm steel shackle with a weight of 2.65 lbs. Includes three stainless steel keys with an ergonomic design

EASY TRANSPORT with FLEXFRAME-U BRACKET: Includes a versatile FlexFrame U-bracket for quick and secure mounting to your bike frame, ensuring convenient transport without the need for a bag or backpack
product_description: The Kryptonite Evolution Mini-5 U-Lock features a 13 mm hardened max performance steel shackle with a double deadbolt anti-rotation design that resists bolt cutters and twisting leverage attacks. The lock’s disc-style cylinder with center keyway is protected by a vinyl coating and is pick and drill resistant. The keyway also features a sliding dust cover to protect the cylinder from dirt and debris when not in use. It includes three stainless steel keys with an ergonomic design to reduce torque and keep them from bending or breaking. Rated at a 7 / 10 on our security scale, the Evolution Mini-5 is good for quick stops on college campuses, a couple of hours in major metropolitan areas, and all day & overnight in suburbs and rural areas. It also includes our patented FlexFrame-U Bracket providing convenient multi-location U-Lock transport. The combination of these great features and our support programs including Key Safe, Anti-Theft Protection, and Lifetime make Kryptonite Bicycle Locks the best choice for protecting what you value.

name: Bike U Lock Heavy Duty Bike Lock Bicycle Lock, 16mm U Lock and 3ft / 5ft / 6ft Length Security Cable with Sturdy Mounting Bracket for Bicycle, Motorcycle and More
short_description: STURDY: This bike u lock is made of 0.63inch(including 0.1inch silicone cover) carbon structural steel which is cutting-resistant, leveraging-resistant. The silicone cover makes u lock can resist corrosion from dust and dirt to prolong the life of your bike lock

NO BLOCKING: The lock cylinder of u lock is made by zinc alloy blade, which has a precise structure to prevent technical opening. With the lock dust cover and zinc alloy lock cylinder, no need to worry about blocking when opening the bicycle lock

CONVENIENT USE: The bike lock comes with a 5feet renforcement steel cable which is coated with PVC covering, and the whole diameter of it is 0.47 inch. With the cable, it will provide your bike with greater locking flexibility and better protection

LARGER SIZE: Introduced a larger bike u-lock size of 8.3*5.7 inches, specifically designed for most bikes. Besides, comes with a mounting bracket that is suitable for bike tubes with a diameter under 1.18 inch. It‘s perfect for securing bicycles, electric bikes, mountain bikes, city bikes, ladders, barbecue grills, sports equipment, lawnmowers, gates and more

EASY INSTALLATION: The mounting bracket holder is easy to install, you can refer to our instructions to install it. This convenient installation enables you to store your bike lock quickly when on a ride

name: Retrospec Lookout U-Lock Bike Lock with 4Ft Security Cable, Heavy Duty Anti-Theft Bicycle Lock with 14mm Shackle, Pick Resistant & Secure Anti-Rotation Design
short_description: Virtually Indestructible This bike lock is made from 14mm hardened steel, making it ultra-strong and durable and offering you peace of mind when you lock up your bike.
Pick & Cut Resistant The hardened deadbolt lock’s anti-rotation design is pick-resistant, and the coated cable offers protection against cutters, adding extra layers of security against theft.
Everything You Need This bike lock includes everything you need to lock up your bike securely: two rust-resistant stainless steel keys, a mounting bracket, and a 4ft cut-resistant cable.
Peace of Mind Between Rides Lock up your bike and never look back. Virtually indestructible and offering maximum security, you can trust that your bike will still be there when you return.
Compatible With Most Bikes With a 9”x4” inside shackle dimension & flexible 4ft cable, this U-Lock can accommodate almost any bicycle frame and wheels.

name: LuTuo Bike U Lock with 2 Keys Heavy Duty Anti Theft Bike Locks, 13.7mm Carbon Steel High Security U Lock for Bicycle with Mount Bracket, Extra Long Bicycle Lock for Scooter Mountain Road Bike
short_description: 【STRONG AND ANTI-THEFT】: LuTuo bicycle u-lock is made of 13.7mm thickened A3 carbon steel with multiple heat treatment process to increase the hardness and strength, anti-cutting, anti-sawing and anti-smashing, providing excellent protection for your bicycle. Note: To ensure the absolute safety of your bicycle, please park it in a safe place.

【LONGER DESIGN】: Unlike smaller u shape locks on the market, our u bike locks are made longer and larger, with an inner size of 9.6inch long and 4.1inch wide, the high security u lock for bicycle can easily lock whether it is a motorcycle, or a mountain bike, road bike, scooter, or electric bike, and can also lock two bikes at the same time.

【EASY TO INSTALL】: The included bracket can easily install the bike D lock on the bike, easy to carry (Note: this cycle U lock is double-open, please be careful to hold the ends of the lock when unlocking, so as not to fall off)

【TWO KEYS】: Bicycle locks heavy duty comes with two copper keys for added convenience, you can keep one key at home as a backup in case of inadvertent loss. Zinc alloy lock core structure precision, more anti-theft, dust cover plays a role in protecting the lock core, waterproof and dustproof.
【AFTER-SALE SERVICE】: You will like this ulock bike lock from us, it is a safe companion for your bike, please contact us in time if you have any questions.

name: Hapleby Premium Bike Lock Set with 2 Keys, Bike U-Lock with 6 Feet Thickened Solid Steel Cable, Heavy Duty Anti Theft Bicycle U-Lock with Mounting Bracket for Road, Mountain, Folding Bike and Scooter
short_description: 1. STURDY AND DURABLE: The HAPLEBY U-Lock is made of 0.55-inch solid steel and is resistant to cutting, prying and drilling. The surface is treated with electrophoresis to forever prevent rust, which greatly improves the service life and good using experience.

2. THOUGHTFUL DESIGN: Dust cover effectively prevent corrosion from rain and debris extending lock life. the bracket holder is easy to install which can hold the u-lock while you’re riding. 2pcs magic strap keep steel cable neatly rolled up.

3. LIGHTWEIGHT AND PORTABLE: The bracket holder is easy to install which can hold the u-lock while you’re riding. and 1.5 pounds with a 6-foot steel cable, perfect for go to school use and for daily commuting needs.

4. WIDE APPLICATION: You can use the u-lock alone or in combination with 6ft steel cables. This Hapleby u-lock can be used to lock bicycles, electric bicycles, ladders, scooter, sports equipment, lawn mowers, gates, etc.

5. PACKAGE INCLUDING: This u-lock kit including 1pcs u-lock, 1pcs mounting bracket, 2pcs key, 2pcs magic strap, 6ft steel cable. I just wish we didn't live in a world where any lock was defeated. but this should be good enough for most purposes.
